metadata.title: Plug-in and play: Add Apple frameworks to your Unity game projects

abstract.text: Help make your Unity app or game an even better experience on Apple platforms. abstract.text: Learn how you can make your Unity games accessible on Apple platforms using our open source Accessibility plug-in. abstract.text: Let‚Äôs rumble! Discover how you can bring third-party game controllers and custom haptics into your games on iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Apple TV. abstract.text: Explore how geometry-aware audio can help you build complex, interactive, and immersive audio scenes for your apps and games. We‚Äôll take you through an overview of the API and its classes, including Sources, Listeners, Acoustic Geometry, and Materials, and introduce the concept of Spatial Modeling.
